DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: VIAGI, A. F.;Viagi, Arcione;Viagi, A;VIAGI, ARCIONE FERREIRA;FERREIRA VIAGI, ARCIONE;ARCIONE FERREIRA, VIAGI

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui pesquisa de pós-doutorado em Gestão da Produção (Programa de estágio pós-doutoral no exterior - CAPES) realizado na Universidade de Padova, Itália (2015/2016), doutorado em Engenharia Aeronáutica e Mecânica pelo Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (2011), mestrado em Comunicação e Mercado pela Faculdade Cásper Líbero (2000) e graduação em Engenharia Mecânica pela Universidade de Taubaté (1985). Cursou também pós-graduação Lato Sensu em Administração da Produção e Operações Industriais na FGV (1989) e Administração Financeira na UNITAU / INPG (1986). Foi Diretor de Ações Educacionais do FNDE - MEC (jan-jul-2019), sendo responsável pelos programas: PNAE - Programa Nacional de Alimentação Escolar, PNLD - Programa Nacional do Livro Didático, PDDE - Programa Dinheiro Direto na Escola, PNATE - Programa Nacional de Apoio ao Transporte do Escolar e programa Caminho da Escola. É professor Assistente III na Universidade de Taubaté (licenciado) onde exerceu também as funções administrativas no Conselho Universitário (Consuni - 2002 a 2006), Conselho de Departamento (Condep - 1997 a 1998), Assessor da Vice-Reitoria (2002 a 2006) e Assessor das Pró-Reitorias de Finanças e de Graduação (2010 a 2014). É professor convidado nos cursos de pós-graduação da Faculdade Trevisan, UFF, INPG, UNIVAP, FAD, IEL e IPG. Ministra aulas de Administração da Produção, Gestão da Cadeia de Suprimentos, Logística Industrial, Manufatura Enxuta, Marketing Industrial, Desenvolvimento de Produtos e Mercados, Planejamento Estratégico, Planejamento Mercadológico, Engenharia Econômica e Tomada de Decisão sob Incerteza.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Has postdoctoral research in Production Management (Postdoctoral internship program abroad - CAPES) carried out at the University of Padova, Italy (2015/2016), doctorate in Aeronautical and Mechanical Engineering from Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (2011), master's degree in Communication and Market from Faculdade Cásper Líbero (2000) and a degree in Mechanical Engineering from Universidade de Taubaté (1985). He also attended a Lato Sensu postgraduate course in Production Management and Industrial Operations at FGV (1989) and Financial Management at UNITAU / INPG (1986). He was Director of Educational Actions at FNDE - MEC (Jan-Jul-2019), being responsible for the programs: PNAE - National School Feeding Program, PNLD - National Textbook Program, PDDE - Money Direct at School Program, PNATE - National Program Support for School Transport and the Caminho da Escola program. He is Assistant Professor III at the University of Taubaté (graduate) where he also held administrative functions at the University Council (Consuni - 2002 to 2006), Department Council (Condep - 1997 to 1998), Advisor to the Vice-Dean (2002 to 2006) and Advisor to the Dean of Finance and Graduate Studies (2010 to 2014). He is a guest professor in the graduate courses at Trevisan College, UFF, INPG, UNIVAP, FAD, IEL and IPG. Takes classes in Production Administration, Supply Chain Management, Industrial Logistics, Lean Manufacturing, Industrial Marketing, Product and Market Development, Strategic Planning, Market Planning, Economic Engineering and Decision Making under Uncertainty.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Impact Factor - 0,992
I International Journal of Recent Research & Review is a non-profit international academic journal. The journal publishes original works with practical significance and academic value. IJRRR commit itself to provide a platform for researchers and practitioners of different fields to share ideas and exchange experiences. IJRRR prefers papers with practical background, clear description, effective physical and mathematical model, physical model with practical significance and theoretical framework, realizable framework of algorithm and successful practical applications. International Journal of Recent Research & Review invites original papers, review articles and short communications that are not published anywhere in different fields of specialization of Engineering & Technology, Science, Management & Humanities. The main objective of IJRRR is to provide an intellectual platform for the international scholars. This is an International referred, quarterly and interdisciplinary Research Journal. The selection and publication of research paper are done after recommendation of referee and subject experts.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Abstract: Natural disasters or complex emergencies affect millions of people every year and cause
losses such as the damage to buildings, infrastructure and natural resources. Because of
this, humanitarian organizations acting increasingly pro-actively to be efficient and
effective in responding to emergencies worldwide. The management of the supply chain
has been used to help in taking preventive action, creating an integrated logistics
structure which reduced the response time. This paper proposes a framework with a new
stage in the disaster management cycle, making risk management proactively planning
and execution and control of the process organizations to act effectively with
catastrophic events.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Abstract?In 2010, the legislation regarding the Brazilian
Policy of Solid Waste (BPSW) was introduced in Brazil. It is
the legal framework for solid waste management that
differentiates what is recyclable and from what is not. The
BPSW features innovations such as Reverse Logistics (RL)
which determines that manufacturers, importers, distributors
and retailers must perform the collection of used packaging
and products like batteries, light bulbs, electronics, etc. The
aim of this paper is to propose a framework that helps
indicating which would be, among the National Collective and
Clearing House models used in European countries, the most
suitable scheme for reverse logistics of Waste Electrical and
Electronic Equipment (WEEE) according to the Brazilian
reality. For this purpose, the paper analyses the existing
literature and various relevant practices used in Europe.
Moreover, data regarding the Brazilian environmental
legislation and the characteristics of each state were used to
evaluate the possible use of the European reverse logistics
models. The framework helps to define the Brazilian case in
three stages and suggests that the most suitable model for
Brazil is the National Collective. This decision is urgent since it
has been proposed that many European countries should also
implement this model instead of the currently employed
(Clearing House). Finally, a structured framework is proposed,
which facilitates the decision-making process to be carried out
by various stakeholders such as the Brazilian Federal
Government, municipal authorities, industries, recyclers and
service providers. In this way, the WEEE management and
logistics organization would be easier in the Brazilian territory.
Keywords?Reverse Logistics, Recycling, Framework, Model,
WEEE, Brazil

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Critical Analysis under the Lean Thinking Point of View of a Supply Chain Management Implementation

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Latin American Journal of Business Management

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The 1990s initiated the development of the concepts of lean production, broadening its scope to all the strategic areas of the organization so that the performance of logistics, previously limited to the transport and distribution of production inputs (raw materials) and finished products has also evolved into the broader scope of the supply chain management. From 2000 onwards, the interactions between these two movements of evolution converge into an increasing application of the lean thinking principles and
tools: not only at the production level, but also in the analysis and restructuring of the supply chain, as a whole. This paper intends to show this convergence through a brief review of the main concepts involved and through a critical analysis of a case of management system supply chain implementing in a flat steel processing plant and distribution company.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Abstract?This work studies the two Reverse Logistics models used in European countries for collection of Waste of Electrical and Electronic Equipment (WEEE), compares their advantages and disadvantages and proposes a framework that helps the decision making process. The paper is articulated as
follows. First, a literature review has been carried out regarding the two systems of WEEE Collection in the European Union: i.e. National Collective Scheme and Clearing House Model. Second, an integrated framework is proposed for managing Reverse Logistics in the disposal of electrical and electronic products and their components at the end of their lifetime. The proposed model may help in the decision making
process of which collection system better fits the specific characteristics of a country.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Abstract: The global competition has imposed challenges to supply chain integration, mainly, during the
process of obtain information to make demand management decisions. This paper proposes an
integrated framework for data collection, analysis and results dissemination in the supply chain
management (SCM), contributing to research and alternatives for ?The Bullwhip Effect? issue.
In this sense, it is necessary to discuss the integration of supply chain management, Enterprise
Resources Planning (ERP) functionality and others systems, to enlarge this scope to the total
supply chain players. The ERP web-based tool and Workflow Systems (WS) can contribute to
solve issues related to supply chain management. Starting from a detailed analysis of the
research background regarding current SCM definitions and integration problems, Information
Technology and Communication (ITC) development and WS in order to map and ensure flow
fluency; the paper proposes a model to increase the overall integrations and an application in a case study for supporting the decisions that are aligned with the company?s strategic objectives.
This paper is divided in: research background; proposed model of the SC integration; case study,
conclusions and future research.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract: The global competition has imposed challenges to supply chain integration, mainly, during the
process of obtain information to make demand management decisions. This paper proposes an
integrated framework for data collection, analysis and results dissemination in the supply chain
management (SCM), contributing to research and alternatives for ?The Bullwhip Effect? issue.
In this sense, it is necessary to discuss the integration of supply chain management, Enterprise
Resources Planning (ERP) functionality and others systems, to enlarge this scope to the total
supply chain players. The ERP web-based tool and Workflow Systems (WS) can contribute to
solve issues related to supply chain management. Starting from a detailed analysis of the
research background regarding current SCM definitions and integration problems, Information
Technology and Communication (ITC) development and WS in order to map and ensure flow
fluency; the paper proposes a model to increase the overall integrations and an application in a case study for supporting the decisions that are aligned with the company?s strategic objectives.
This paper is divided in: research background; proposed model of the SC integration; case study,
conclusions and future research.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Serolav (fictitious name) is a company that specializes in
the transportation of securities and was created in 2000. The object
of this study was to identify the factors that caused inefficiency in the
cash flow of ATMs, due to constant breaks in access control
performed. through automatic sliding gates at the exit of the cash
truck. The work involved Total Productive Maintenance (TPM)
practices, the use of quality tools. The methodology used was the case
study with the static analysis of the collected data. Once each of the
problems present in the company were identified, the quality tools
were applied, such as: Brainstorming, Histogram, Pareto Diagram,
Ishikawa Cause and Effect Diagram and Flowchart, among others.
From the application of the tools promising results were obtained
that allowed to eliminate or reduce the problems, with the
improvement of the output flow of the strong cars (CFs) and the
non-payment of fines. At the end of the work a maintenance plan
was proposed to be followed through a CheckList and it was possible
to record financial gains during the process maintenance period
Keywords: Maintenance. TPM. Access Control. Quality

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The correct administration between planning and executing production plans must be based on technical premises of knowledge of PPCP, since delivery deadlines and production capacities are previously defined, and do not always have an alignment between the need for demand and the capacity to execution. In this context, the work proposes the implantation of a master production plan to define and level the industrial demand in an auto parts industry, using an ERP system. Thus, the general objective of the research is that through the implementation of a master production plan, the occurrence of setup is reduced, the inventory control and production leveling are improved, since it must consider the best configuration for production. , as well as definition of necessary infrastructure and manpower. With this, the research aims to demonstrate the commitment to the satisfaction of its customers and the operations, without losing focus on premises such as leveling production, inventory control and reduction of setups, clearly presenting the application of the master production plan and how it can assist in the transformation of long-term productive plans for finished products to the medium term, in order to direct the company's operational planning steps.

KEY WORDS: PPCP, Demand, Inventory, ERP.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Enablers and constraints in implementing lean manufacturing: evidence from brazilian SMEs
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Enablers and constraints in implementing lean manufacturing: evidence from brazilian SMEs

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract: Lean Manufacturing has revolutionized the global manufacturing environment at an unprecedented
rate. In scholarly and managerial literature, many works have reported that Lean Manufacturing is a very
efficient approach and a straightforward way towards process improvements, in terms of productivity and value
adding activities ratio. However, many studies on Lean Manufacturing have highlighted many problems in its
implementation. The analysis carried out within the research project is aimed to the factors enabling or
constraining the Lean Transformation of a firm?s production system, along with the most relevant tools or
practices to be applied. The research methodology used is the so-called ?Normative Delphi? with a panel formed
by 32 experts coming from 16 Brazilian SMEs. Our results are partially consistent with what has already been
discussed in the literature and we found that the most relevant tools/practices are: value stream mapping, 5S
methodology, and Kaizen (Gemba walks); the top three enabling factors are: knowledge and sponsorship of
senior management, focus on continuous improvement, and employee development fostered by the company;
finally, the main critical constraints are: little support from the top management, resistance to change by middle
management, and poor or non-qualified Lean training activities.
Keywords: Lean Manufacturing, Implementation, Change Management, SMEs, Delphi

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: ELIMINAÇÃO DE ESTOQUE ENTRE ETAPAS DE PROCESSO EM METALURGIA DO PÓ COM UTILIZAÇÃO DA METODOLOGIA WCM
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Stock elimination between process steps in powder metallurgy with use of WCM methodology

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente artigo visa demonstrar os ganhos obtidos com a mudança de fluxo de processo entre a Compactação e Sinterização em processo de Metalurgia do pó, visando eliminar o estoque em processo entre estas operações. A fundamentação utilizada para a alteração do fluxo, foi estruturada na utilização da metodologia WCM (World Class Manufacturing) com a integração dos Pilares LCS (Logistic and Customer Service) administrado pela logística e EEM (Early Equipment Management), administrado pela engenharia industrial. Com objetivo de demonstrar os resultados da integração entre os dois pilares, foi realizado um estudo de caso em uma indústria do setor automotivo localizada no ABC paulista onde os resultados obtidos, comprovam as melhorias esperadas com a eliminação do estoque WIP entre as duas operações. O presente trabalho, demonstra os problemas relacionados com este estoque, como foram solucionados e os resultados obtidos
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article aims to demonstrate the gains obtained with the change of process flow between the compaction and sintering in the powder metallurgy process, aiming to eliminate the stock in process between these operations. The rationale used for changing the flow was structured in the use of the WCM (World Class Manufacturing) methodology with the integration of the LCS Pillars (Logistic and Customer Service) managed by logistics and EEM (Early Equipment Management, managed by industrial engineering. In order to demonstrate the results of the integration between the two pillars, a case study was carried out in an industry in the automotive sector located in ABC São Paulo, where the results obtained prove the expected improvements with the elimination of the WIP stock between the two operation.The present work demonstrates the problems related to this stock, how they were solved, and the results obtained.Keywords: JIT, WCM, Pressing, Sintering, Stock, Process, Demand

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: SISTEMA SIMPLIFICADO DE CONTROLE DE ESTOQUE - SISCE / SIMPLIFIED INVENTORY CONTROL SYSTEM - SISCE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: RESUMOA gestão e ocontrole de estoque sãoassuntosimportantese relevantespara as empresas,porque possibilitammaximizaçãoo uso dos recursospara conseguir maior lucro mantendoos níveis de satisfaçãodos clientes.As modernas tecnologias de informações ajudam asempresas na boa gestão docontrole de estoque.Isso significa que,seja possível para as empresas, por meio de um software, mensurar com mais exatidão a quantidade de material que deve ser adquirido e também o período mais adequado para aquisição, atendendo a demandacorrentee também demandaspontuaise imprevistas. Apesar da importância do controle de estoque, as publicaçõesacadêmicassão realizadas, algumas vezes,usando planilhas eletrônicas e/ou folhas de papeis planilhadas, limitando o conhecimento do valor que poderia ser ganho com uma boa gestão de controle de estoque. A proposta desse artigo é apresentar osoftware de controle de estoque para comunidade acadêmicaaqui chamadode ?Sistema Simplificadode Controle de Estoque ?SISCE?. O software ?SISCE?consegue simular, em um prazo mais curto,o quefor necessário ao atendimento das demandas, consolidando assim reduções necessárias e ganhos financeiros,resultado em ummelhor controle dos recursos materiais.Palavras chave: Controle de Estoque,Tecnologia da Informação,Simulação.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ABSTRACTInventory management and control are important and relevant issues for companies, because they make it possible to maximize the use of resources to obtain greater profit while maintaining customer satisfaction levels. With modern information technologies, companies in good management of inventory control. This means that it is possible for companies, through software, to measure more accurately the amount of material that must purchase andthe most suitable period for acquisition, meeting current demand andoccasional and unforeseen demands. Despite the importance of inventory control, academic publications on inventory control sometime performed using spreadsheets and / or sheets of knowledge, limiting the amount that could gained from good inventory control management. The purpose of this article is to present the inventory control software to the academic community called here the Sistema Simplificado de Controle de Estoque -SISCE. The SISCE software is able to simulate, in a shorter period, what is necessary to meet the demands, thus consolidating the necessary reductions and financial gains resulting from a better control of material resources.Key words: Inventory control,Information Technology,Simulation

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: ADVANCED LOGISTICS IN THE MANAGEMENT OF NEW LAUNCHS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista Latino-Americana de Inovação e Engenharia de Produção

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente artigo busca apresentar a interação entre PPCP-Planejamento Programação e Controle da Produção e APQP-Advanced Product Quality Planning ou Planejamento avançado da qualidade do produto, processo desenvolvido inicialmente no fim dos anos 80 por uma comissão de especialistas de três das maiores empresas automobilística americana, composta por Ford, General Motors e Chrysler. Aplicando características de métodos empregados neste artigo descritas como abordagem qualitativa com natureza de pesquisa aplicada e método exploratório e de pesquisa bibliográfica, em uma empresa fornecedora TIER I-Fornecedor nível 1, atuante há 70 anos no mercado nacional, demonstrando como a padronização e critérios para a realização de administração de novos materiais e planejamento de produção, através da explosão da BoM, consolidação de lead times, capacidade produtiva, e follow up com auxílio do módulos MM e PP do ERP SAP, pode demonstrar eficácia e eficiência do processo de PPCP atuante na gestão de projetos, mitigando falhas no processo de lançamento de novos produtos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT. This article presents interaction between PPCP production planning and PQP-Advanced Product Quality Planning, process initially developed in the late 1980s by a committee of specialists from three of the largest automobile American companies, consisting of Ford, General Motors and Chrysler. Applying characteristics of methods used in this article described as a qualitative approach with an applied research nature and exploratory method and bibliographic research, in a supplier company TIER I-Supplier, operating in the national market for 70 years, demonstrating how the standardization and criteria for the administration of new materials and production planning, through the explosion of BoM, consolidation of lead times, productive capacity, and follow up with the help of the MM and PP modules of the SAP ERP, can demonstrate effectiveness and efficiency of the active production plan process in project management, mitigating failures in the process of new launchs.
Keywords: Standard APQP, PPCP, SAP, Lead Time, BoM and materials management.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A variabilidade está ligada a necessidade e possibilidade de compra do consumidor, estudos pertinentes a este fator incita as pesquisas e estudos de variação da demanda, assim como métodos para antever seus impactos ao cliente final. Busca-se um método prático com intuito de definir e manter manutenção de cálculo que considere estoques de segurança de materiais, visando variações da demanda, nível de serviço probabilístico e lead time do processo de suprimento de materiais, que possam ser geridos em software de fácil acesso como o Microsoft Excel. Demostrando praticidade ao dia a dia, somada a redução e a predição de possíveis rupturas no abastecimento de clientes e linhas produtivas. Fundamentado por estudos pertinentes ao tema que permeou a estrutura base desta pesquisa, com intuito de reduzir e antever possíveis rupturas no abastecimento de clientes e linhas produtivas, mantendo salvaguardado a imagem da empresa no que tange atendimento ao cliente. A pesquisa do método fundamentado por estudos pertinentes a desvio padrão demanda lead time, nível de serviço e estoque de segurança, se mostrou satisfatório, pois pode auxiliar no entendimento teórico do método assim como agregou conhecimento simplificados de estatística e probabilidade, demonstrando na prática que sua aplicação, atende o objetivo desta pesquisa.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT The variability is connecting to the need and possibility of purchase and consumer, studies pertinent to this factor incites research and studies of variation and demand, as well as methods to anticipate their impacts to the final customer.Looking for a practical method to define and maintain calculation maintenance,considering material security stocks, aiming at variations of demand, probabilistic service level of costumer, and lead-time of material supply process, that it could be managing in easy software access such as Microsoft Excel. Demonstrating practicality to dayto-day combined with the reduction and prediction of possible disruptions in customer supply and production lines. Based on pertinent studies of the subject that permeated the basic structure of this research, in order to reduce and anticipate possible ruptures in the supply of customers and production lines, keeping the company's brand in customer service safeguarded. The method of the research was based on studies related to standard deviation demands, lead time, service level of costumer and safety stock, was satisfactory, since it can aid in the theoretical understanding of the method as well as added simplified knowledge of statistics and probability, demonstrating in practice that its application, meets the objective of this research. 
Keywords:Standard deviation, Demand, Service level of costumer, Safet stock.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: UTILIZAÇÃO DO SISTEMA ERP PARA GESTÃO DO LEAD TIME NECESSÁRIO PARA MANUTENÇÃO DE FERRAMENTAIS EM UMA FERRAMENTARIA / USING THE ERP SYSTEM TO MANAGE THE TIME REQUIRED TO MAINTAIN TOOLING IN A TOOL ROOM
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Using the ERP system to manage the time required to maintain toolingin a tool room

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Resumo
O presente artigo tem como proposta, apresentar uma pesquisa sobre a utilização do sistema de informação ERP, para o gerenciamento do lead time necessário para manutenções de ferramentais em uma ferramentaria. Em muitas empresas foi adotado a utilização deste sistema para melhorar a interação das atividades e adquirir uma visão geral dos processos. O objetivo do presente estudo, foi apresentar a quantidade de intervenções e horas utilizadas para manutenções de ferramentais, sem a utilização de um sistema ERP, durante um ano. Com base nas quantidades de intervenções, foi sugerido a aquisição de um sistema de informação para o gerenciamento das manutenções preventivas e preditivas. O método de pesquisa utilizado foi através de pesquisa bibliográficas e exploratórias, para o compreendimento dos termos relativos ao tema, realizou-se a descrição dos fundamentos básicos de lead time, ferramentaria e ferramentais, PPCP, manutenção, sistema de informação ERP e curva ABC. Um estudo de caso de uma ferramentaria sem sistema de informação, apresentou a quantidade de intervenções e horas gastas em manutenção numa ferramentaria, gerando um valor expressivo em gastos de manutenções e consequentes paradas de produção. Constatou-se que um sistema ERP, supri as necessidades de gerenciamento de manutenção preventivas de ferramentais para uma ferramentaria. A conclusão deste artigo, foi fundamentada na pesquisa realizada sobre as quantidades de manutenções de uma ferramentaria, sem a utilização de um sistema ERP, e na teoria do sistema de informação ERP. Promovendo embasamento para assegurar que: obteremos um resultado satisfatório no gerenciamento das programações de paradas, necessárias para as manutenções de ferramentais; e garantindo a eficiência na gestão da programação de manutenção de ferramentais de uma ferramentaria.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ABSTRACT The aim of this article is to present a research on the use of the ERP information system for the management of the lead time necessary for the maintenance of the tooling in a tool room. In many companies, the use of this system has been adopted to improve the interactionof activities and obtain an overview of the processes. The objective of the present study is to point out the number of interventions and hours used to maintain tools, without using an ERP system, for one year. Due to the number of interventions, it was suggested the acquisition of an information system for the management of preventive and predictive maintenance. The research method used bibliography and exploratory research, to understand the terminology, the description of the basic fundamentals of lead time, tool room and tooling, PPCP, maintenance, ERP information system and ABC curve. A case study of a tool room, without an information system, presented the number of interventions and hours spent on maintenance in a tool room, generating a significant amount in maintenance costs and consequent production stops. It showed that an ERP system meets the management needs of preventive maintenance from a tooling to a tool room. The article was based on the research done on the maintenance quantities of a toolroom, without using an ERP system, and on the theory of the ERP information system. It demonstrates that there is a satisfactory result in the management of the stoppage schedules, necessary for the maintenance of the tooling; and ensure efficient in the management of the tooling maintenance schedule of a tool room.Keywords:ERP system, Tool room,Lead time,Maintenance.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Farming is very important for the development of a country economy and, in Brazil, cattle (meat and milk) is one of the most important sectors of this segment. This paper aims to develop a conceptual framework to identify the key characteristics of the Short Food Supply Chain and, moreover, propose a model for the implementation of sustainability in the sector of small milk producers and dairy products. The research presents data from small producers located in Paraná, Brazil and utilizes the better condition of Italian producers in the Veneto region as a benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement by adopting the concept of Short Food Supply Chain. The conclusion of the analysis showed that there are significant gains for small farmers with the adoption of the proposed model because it solves several issues that currently hinder the development of the sector.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Farming is very important for the development of a country economy and, in Brazil, cattle (meat and milk) is one of the most important sectors of this segment. This paper aims to develop a conceptual framework to identify the key characteristics of the Short Food Supply Chain and, moreover, propose a model for the implementation of sustainability in the sector of small milk producers and dairy products. The research presents data from small producers located in Paraná, Brazil and utilizes the better condition of Italian producers in the Veneto region as a benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement by adopting the concept of Short Food Supply Chain. The conclusion of the analysis showed that there are significant gains for small farmers with the adoption of the proposed model because it solves several issues that currently hinder the development of the sector.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Serviços de arquitetura e engenharia; testes e análises técnicas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
New forms of appropriation of economic activities that had ceased or were in the process of failure, have been recently established in Italy. These initiatives are carried out by the cooperation of laid-off workers and/or workers subsidized by governmental unemployment insurance, and they are inspired by experiences on an international scope, such as South American empersas recuperadas. Therefore, former workers organized as cooperatives try to recover the company in which they were previously employed with the acquisition of business units or through purchase agreements, becoming directly involved in the management and leadership of the firms. In this way, the workers become entrepreneurs by resorting to workers? buy-outs (WBO). The aim of this paper is to investigate the phenomenon of WBO initiatives in relationship to the social resilience of the territory. More precisely, in this work, the authors shed light on WBO actions meant as initiatives for companies restoration from the bottom, such as with other bottom-up actions as in the context of public real-estate regeneration. Through a multivariate analysis, the WBO initiatives have been investigated concerning their uneven geographical distribution in Italy.

Keywords: Social capital Economic and social resilience Workers buy-out

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The purpose of this dissertation is to show the advantage of introducing Periodic Review and Continuous Review management model application of inventories, in order to possibility to define and maintain a service level management for customers using simple mathematical models using recovery of established inventory management techniques, based on in the appropriate literature. As researches that refer to inventory management are growing day by day and gaining interest from investors and researchers, who seek to monetize the capital employed. Businesses that fail to make their merchandise available end up damaging the company's brand and culminating in their customers looking for other sources. In this work, periodic review and continuous review method was applied to inventory management of resale material suppliers of an auto parts company. These methods were directed according peculiarities of each supplier, being continuously reviewed for local material supplier and periodic for imported material supplier. The application of these methods in the studied company showed real gains totaled 0.4% of resale market marginal annual respect to local suppliers, still establishing a level of service in 95%. Imported Suppliers, the marginal real gain totaled 7% of annualized data while still establishing a 75% service level, both reducing stock shortages (outages) through increased availability of materials for resale, based on demand-based studies and controls for forecasting variability, new sales generate a marginal return on annual spare parts sales of 4%. Concluding that model development with application periodic review and continuous review in the inventory management of an auto parts company, proves to be an advantageous method for managing inventories, leveraging sales and minimizing disruptions by predicting demand variability, maintaining the level of customer service.

Key words: Production Planning; Inventory; Continues review; Periodic review.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The survival of companies depends on their capacity for innovation and quick adaptation to the market requirements that is constantly changing. Factors such as high competition, demand variations and the new products launch, require flexible manufacturing processes with the capacity to expand the production volume, whenever the market is favorable to it, and thus keep the company ahead competition. Among all the manufacturing processes existing in the automobile industry, the final assembly area is the one that suffers the most, due to the production mix (several models that are produced), and due to limited physical spaces and inefficient logistical means, the final assembly is limited and many times it is unable to produce enough to meet the market demand, becoming the ?bottleneck? in the productive expansion, so it is necessary to develop new assembly lines to supply this demand for new products. In this context, the present work approaches the development and use of a dimensioning method for vehicular assembly line, which is validated with the use of computer simulation of discrete systems. This method has the purpose of providing support for the company's decision making, and this have being done, through the elaboration and study of several prospective scenarios in the planning and pre-project stages of an assembly line, which will be developed, and thus provide support to evaluate the best alternative, that meets the economic requirements of the production process development for a new product, that will be launched in the future. The advantages obtained with this dimensioning method together with computer simulation for planning are: the quick elaboration and analysis of production scenarios, which will support in decision making, the reduction of investment and development time, the reduction of risks and project errors and the previous discovery of bottlenecks and variations in the process that would impact on productive capacity, even before the project d

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O objetivo dessa dissertação é demonstrar que a falta do processo formal para a gestão de listas técnicas ocasiona baixa acuracidade no planejamento de produção, gera atrasos nas revisões de formulação e no lançamento de novos produtos. A gestão padronizada das listas técnicas de engenharia e produção tem a capacidade de alcançar e manter as especificações técnicas do produto. Um processo eficiente, integrado e confiável para revisão e inclusão de novas formulações é relevante para apoiar o alcance dos objetivos da empresa. O objetivo geral da elaboração de um processo formal é a garantia da atualização, sistematicamente e concomitantemente, das listas técnicas no sistema ERP e nos documentos e registros físicos, especificamente sistematiza e sincroniza as ações dos departamentos da empresa, desenvolve método para o cálculo das listas de produção e listas de engenharia e dá abrangência para análises dos indicadores de desperdícios potencializando as oportunidades de redução do custo. Modelo delimitado para as ocasiões de necessidade de inclusão, exclusão e revisão de listas técnicas de engenharia e produção. Pesquisa desenvolvida em uma empresa brasileira de alimentos que possui programas de excelência TPM e Kaizen. A metodologia do tipo pesquisa-ação buscou a solução de um problema comum de interesse da organização, a gestão de listas é considerada uma key practice para a estratégia do negócio. Na administração da produção as decisões de controles têm por finalidade resolver uma variedade de problemas das operações, administrar atividades que se inter-relacionam consiste em utilizar da melhor forma possível os recursos para conseguir alcançar os objetivos. As listas técnicas, também chamadas de lista de materiais ou bill of materials mostra como um produto é formado, elas são a estrutura principal de uma das três estruturas de entradas do MRP II, garante a acuracidade no planejamento de materiais. O custo padrão é um instrumento de controle para indicar providência
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The objective of this dissertation is to demonstrate that the lack of a formal process for the management of technical lists causes low accuracy in production planning, generates delays in formulation reviews and in the launch of new products. Standardized management of engineering and production technical lists has the capacity to achieve and maintain the technical specifications of the product. An efficient, integrated and reliable process for reviewing and adding new formulations is relevant to support the achievement of the company's objectives. The general objective of the elaboration of a formal process is to guarantee the updating, systematically and concurrently, of the technical lists in the ERP system and in the physical documents and records, specifically systematizes and synchronizes the actions of the company's departments, develops a method for calculating the lists of production and engineering lists and provides scope for analysis of waste indicators, enhancing opportunities for cost reduction. Model delimited for the occasions when it is necessary to include, exclude and revise engineering and production technical lists. Research developed in a Brazilian food company that has programs of excellence TPM and Kaizen. The research-action methodology sought to solve a common problem of interest to the organization, list management is considered a key practice for business strategy. In production management, control decisions aim to solve a variety of operational problems, managing activities that are interrelated consists of using the best possible resources to achieve the objectives. The bill of materials shows how a product is formed, they are the main structure of one of the three input structures of MRP II, guaranteeing accuracy in material planning. The standard cost is a control instrument to indicate measures where losses occur, and the practical solution of problems of the Toyota Production System is based on generating an efficient solution and

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Resumo:
Para atendimento à demanda de fornecimento de petróleo e seus derivados,
as empresas deste setor no Brasil, especialmente a Petrobras, investem na montagem
de dutos terrestres para transporte destes produtos, e os custos para desenvolver tais
tarefas são altos e envolvem significativa quantidade de recursos de mão de obra e
de equipamentos. Portanto, este trabalho teve como principal objetivo a aplicação da
ferramenta de Mapeamento de Fluxo de Valor (MFV) para mapeamento do estado
atual e do estado futuro dos processos de montagem de dutos terrestres utilizados
para o fornecimento de petróleo e seus derivados, desde a aquisição de tubos até a
conclusão da montagem da tubulação, com posterior análise crítica dos mapeamentos
realizados. Depois da avaliação crítica dos Mapeamentos de Fluxo de Valor no Estado
Futuro, foram propostos planos de ações para a realização das eventuais e possíveis
introduções de melhoria, visando atingir o estado futuro, possibilitando a redução do
custo e do prazo para o desenvolvimento do referido processo.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
To supply the demand of oil derivatives, companies in this sector in Brazil,
especially Petrobras, invest in the assembly of terrestrial pipelines to transport these
products and the costs to perform such tasks are high and involve large amounts of
workers and equipment resources. Therefore, the main objective of this work was the
application of the Value Stream Mapping (MFV) tool to map the current state and future
state of the pipeline assembly processes used to supply oil and its derivatives, since
the acquisition of pipes until the completion of the pipe assembly, with subsequent
critical analysis of the realized mappings. Following the critical evaluation of Value
Stream Mapping in the Future State, action plans were proposed to carry out possible
and possible improvements in order to reach the future state, making it possible to
reduce the cost and deadline for the development of said process.
Key Words: Lean Manufacturing, Lean Thinking, Toyota Production System, Lean
Production, Pipeline Modal

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT

The drive for competition compels the automotive industry to grow and invest more
and more in new products and in manufacturing processes themselves, always aiming to
increase production capacity in order to obtain the highest profit with the lowest investment,
and improving even more the product?s quality, Thus, it is essential to search for alternatives
that will offer to the market innovative and reliable products with competitive prices,
launched in shorter timings. However, for this, this requires to find for alternatives that lead
to offer to the market innovative and reliable products with competitive prices, and launched
in increasingly shorter terms. This not only means shortening the development and launch
time of new products, but also adapting or providing productive means to meet new product
specifications, focusing on two important features: implementation time and precision in the
study of scenarios for new production systems, this paper presents the advanced
manufacturing engineering function, which is responsible for planning, developing and
implementing a new structure or adapting an existing structure, increasingly accurate and
effective, minimizing risks and errors in design; and through scenario analysis, to estimate
the investment and resource required for a new vehicle production system design, assisting
company executives in decision making. The advantages obtained with the sizing method and
the computer simulation in the scenario study and planning phases are the investments
reduction, development time reduction of a new process, the early identification of production
bottlenecks and process variation, that impact the capacity of the productive system. In this
context this work had a fundamental role for the company, ensuring scenarios study agility
and the analysis of impacts on manufacturing.
Keywords: Computer Simulation, Productive Process, Vehicle Final Assembly Line,
Automobile Industry, Industrial Pro

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: O TPM e a Manutenção Autônoma dentro de um processo de melhoria contínua: estudo de caso de aumento de OEE em uma Indústria Química
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: The Autonomous Maintenance used to incresead industrial productivity.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
ABRÃO, Odair José. A Manutenção Autônoma utilizada no aumento da produtividade industrial. 2020. Dissertação (Mestrado Profissional em Engenharia Mecânica ? Área de concentração em Produção - Departamento de Engenharia Mecânica ? Universidade de Taubaté, Taubaté, São Paulo - Brasil.
Em períodos de instabilidade econômica aliado à competitividade de mercado, onde cada vez mais se exige que as empresas tenham seu produto a um preço competitivo, entra em cena a manutenção autônoma, visando o aumento da produtividade, atrelado a um baixo custo operacional. O objetivo deste trabalho é demonstrar a importância da metodologia TPM (manutenção produtiva total), bem como, seus pilares, em especial a manutenção autônoma, inserida num processo de melhoria contínua atrelada a outras ferramentas como o SIPOC, Gráfico de Pareto, Diagrama de Causa e Efeito e Programa de Ideias de Melhoria, visando a excelência operacional dos processos. A aplicação de um estudo de caso evidenciará o aumento da produtividade industrial, medida através do indicador de OEE (eficiência global do equipamento), que aliada à alta demanda de mercado, pode proporcionar patamares recordes de faturamento.
Palavras-chave: Melhoria Contínua ? TPM ? Manutenção Autônoma ? OEE ? Indústria Química
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABRÃO, Odair José. The Autonomous Maintenance used to incresead industrial productivity. 2020. Monograph (Professional Master Degree in Mechanical Engineering ? Production´s Area) Department of Mechanical Engineering - University of Taubaté, Taubaté, São Paulo - Brazil.
In periods of economic instability whit market competitiveness, where companies are increasingly required to have their product a competitive price, autonomous maintenance comes into play, aming at increasing productivity, coupled to a low operational cost. The objective of this work is to demonstrate the importante of the TPM methodology (total prodcutive maintenance), as well as its pillars, especially autonomous maintenace, inserted in a process continuous improvement tied to others tools such as SIPOC, Pareto Chart, Cause and Effect Diagram and Improvement Ideas Program, aiming at operational excelence of processes. The aplication of a case study will evidence the increase in industrial productivity, measured through the OEE indicator (overall equipement efectiveness), wich combined with high market demand, can provide record levels of revenue.
Keywords:Continous Improvement ? TPM ? Autonomous Maintenance ? OEE ? Chemical Industry

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: MELHORIA NO FLUXO DE UMA TRANSPORTADORA DE VALOR UTILIZANDO CONCEITO DE VSM E TPM
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: IMPROVING THE FLOW OF A VALUE CARRIER USING THE VSM AND TPM CONCEPT

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Atividades de vigilância, segurança e investigação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A alta concorrência entre empresas no segmento de transportadora de valor, criou
a necessidade deste estudo, onde incorria sobre ela a penalização de multas pelo
não cumprimento de metas acordadas em contrato, provocando assim, custos com
horas extras e retrabalhos que, após análise estavam sendo geradas pelas falhas
constantes no controle de acesso das eclusas do pátio operacional. Desta forma,
este estudo teve como objetivo implantar os conceitos de Manutenção Produtiva
Total - TPM e Value Streaming Map ? VSM nos equipamentos de acesso,
objetivando uma maior disponibilidade, confiabilidade e eliminação do
desperdício, visando garantir o abastecimento dos caixas eletrônicos dentro dos
prazos estabelecidos. O desafio da área de manutenção foi prever essas falhas e
quebras indesejadas, já que resultavam na interrupção parcial ou total da
prestação de serviço. Esta implantação considerou após uma pesquisa
bibliográfica e uma pesquisa de campo, uma abordagem na coleta dos dados de
falhas dos acessos das eclusas, mapeamento do fluxo de chegada e saída dos
carros fortes, levantamento estatístico e aplicado as ferramentas da qualidade.
Depois das ações preventivas implantadas pela área de manutenção, os
indicadores obtidos apresentaram um aumento na disponibilidade do
equipamento, números de abastecimentos de caixas eletrônicos e cancelamento
das multas apresentados no decorrer deste estudo. A partir do exposto, a
manutenção se apresentou em um lugar de destaque e com uma atuação
estratégica junto a outros setores produtivos da empresa.
Palavras Chave: Produtiva, Mapa de Fluxo de Valor, Qualidade, Controle
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The high competition between the value carrier companies created the need for this
study where the studied company incurred the penalty of fines for non-fulfillment of the
contract goals, overtime costs and rework that, after analysis, were being impacted by
the constant failures in the control access to the locks of the operational yard. Thus,
this study aims to implement the concepts of total productive maintenance - TPM and
Value Streaming Map - VSM in access equipment for greater availability, reliability and
elimination of waste, aiming to guarantee the supply of ATMs within the established
deadlines. The challenge in the maintenance area is to predict these unwanted failures
and breaks, since they resulted in the partial or total interruption of service provision.
This implantation considered after a bibliographic research and a field research, an
approach in the collection of the data of failures of the accesses of the locks, mapping
of the flow of arrival and departure of the strong cars, statistical survey and applied the
quality tools. After the preventive actions implemented by the maintenance area, the
indicators obtained showed an increase in the availability of the equipment, numbers
of ATM supplies and cancellation of the fines presented during this study. Based on
the foregoing, maintenance performed in a prominent place and with a strategic
performance with other productive sectors of the company.
Keywords: Productive, Value Streaming Map, Quality, Control

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: PROPOSTA DE MÉTODO PARA SOLUÇÃO DE RUPTURA NA GESTÃO OPERACIONAL E APLICAÇÃO NA SISTEMATIZAÇÃO DA GESTÃO DE LISTAS TÉCNICAS
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: PROPOSED METHOD FOR BREACH SOLUTION IN OPERATIONAL MANAGEMENT AND APPLICATION IN THE SYSTEMATIZATION OF TECHNICAL LIST MANAGEMENT

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de Produtos Alimentícios

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
RESUMO

O consumo tem passado por uma mudança substancial, adequar-se às tendências é uma condição de sobrevivência para operar no dinâmico mercado de bens de consumo. Há uma crescente segmentação dos produtos com os ciclos de vida se reduzindo e as demandas por uma produção sob medida aumentando, com isso ocorre aumento na diversidade de produtos e a redução do volume por SKU. Uma permanente atenção para o redesenho de produtos deve ser uma constante preocupação das empresas. A fim de permanecer competitivos os produtos certos devem ser desenvolvidos e lançados com sucesso em prazos cada vez mais curtos. Esse conjunto de características tornam constantes as necessidades de inclusões e revisões nas listas técnicas no sistema da empresa. Adicionalmente à diversidade dos produtos, a produção em escala exige o controle de um número muito grande de informações sobre os materiais necessários à produção, atendendo essa necessidade o sistema de gestão de materiais MRP II tem sido cada vez mais utilizado para melhoria da eficiência operacional das fábricas, tendo a precisão da lista técnica de materiais como sua espinha dorsal. Desta forma essa dissertação tem como objetivo, por meio da sistematização, obter a garantia da atualização, sistemática e concomitante, das listas técnicas no sistema MRP II e nos controles e parâmetros da produção. A pesquisa-ação considerou, após uma pesquisa bibliográfica, construir um processo formal de gestão de listas técnicas que abrangeu fluxograma, método de cálculo de listas, abrangência de análise de indicadores e governança para gestão dos desperdícios. O método para solução de ruptura na gestão operacional adotado na pesquisa foi o produto da integração dos métodos ciclos da pesquisa-ação com o processo de solução prática de problemas da Toyota. Um grupo de trabalho de especialistas e pesquisador foi constituído para construir, padronizar e implementar o processo de gestão de listas técnicas. O desenvolvimento da pesquisa significou d
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT

Consumption has undergone a substantial change, adapting to trends is a condition for survival to operate in the dynamic consumer goods market. There is a growing segmentation of products with reduced life cycles and the demand for tailor-made production increasing, with an increase in product diversity and a reduction in volume per SKU. Permanent attention to product redesign should be a constant concern for companies. In order to remain competitive, the right products must be developed and successfully launched in increasingly short time frames. This set of characteristics makes the needs for inclusions and revisions in the technical lists in the company's system constant. In addition to the diversity of products, scale production requires the control of a very large number of information about the materials needed for production, meeting this need the MRP II material management system has been increasingly used to improve the operational efficiency of factories, having the precision of the technical list of materials as its backbone. Thus, this dissertation aims, through the systematization of management, to obtain the guarantee of updating, systematically and concurrently, the technical lists in the MRP II system and in the controls and parameters of production. The action research considered, after a bibliographic search, to build a formal process of management of technical lists that included flowchart, method of calculating lists, scope of analysis of indicators and governance for waste management. The method for resolving disruptions in operational management adopted in the survey was the product of integrating the methods of the cycles of action research with Toyota's practical problem solving process. A working group of experts and researcher was formed to build, standardize and implement the management process for technical lists. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
RESUMO
O objetivo desta dissertação é demonstrar que a partir da aplicação do modelo de
Revisão Periódica e Revisão Continua na gestão de estoques, é possível estabelecer e manter a
administração do nível de serviço aos clientes utilizando-se de modelos matemáticos simples
através do resgate de técnicas consagradas na administração de estoques, baseados em
literatura apropriada. As pesquisas que se referem à gestão de estoques vêm crescendo a cada
dia e ganhando o interesse de empresários e pesquisadores, que buscam rentabilizar o capital
empregado ao tempo em que negócios falham ao disponibilizar suas mercadorias e acabam
prejudicando a imagem da empresa culminando para que seus clientes busquem outras fontes.
Neste trabalho foi aplicado o método de revisão periódica e revisão continua na gestão de
estoques de fornecedores de materiais de revendas em uma empresa de autopeças, os métodos
foram direcionados de acordo com peculiaridades de cada fornecedor, sendo revisão continua
para o fornecedor de material local e periódico para os fornecedores de materiais importados.
A aplicação dos sistemas de revisão de estoques na empresa estudada demonstrou reduções de
custos totais na gestão de estoques e ganhos marginais anualizados no mercado de revenda
para fornecedores locais, mantendo também um nível de serviço adequado, já para os
Fornecedores de Importados a fim de manter um nível de serviço suficiente para suprir vendas
e reduzir rupturas se fez necessário um investimento em manutenção de estoques, e estudos
específicos para determinar o melhor custo-benefício para o nível de serviço escolhido, os
trabalhos realizados para os materiais importados foram significativos, pois os ganhos
marginais foram superiores ao do fornecedor local. O sistema de revisão de estoques aplicado
reduziu rupturas, mediante a maior disponibilidade de materiais para revenda, pautada em
estudos com base em demanda e controles para previsão de variabilidade, o desenvolvime
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT

The purpose of this dissertation is to show the advantage of introducing Periodic
Review and Continuous Review management model application of inventories, in order to
possibility to define and maintain a service level management for customers using simple
mathematical models using recovery of established inventory management techniques, based
on in the appropriate literature. As researches that refer to inventory management are
growing day by day and gaining interest from investors and researchers, who seek to
monetize the capital employed. Businesses fail to make their merchandise available end up
damaging the company's brand and culminating in their customers looking for other sources.
This work based on periodic review and continuous review method was applied to inventory
management of resale material suppliers of an auto parts company. These methods were
directed according peculiarities of each supplier, being continuously reviewed for local
material supplier and periodic for imported material supplier. The application of the methods
in the studied company demonstrates total cost reductions in inventory management and
annualized marginal gains in the resale market for local suppliers, while also maintaining an
adequate level of service, for Import Suppliers in order to maintain a sufficient level of
service to supply sales and reduce disruptions, an investment in inventory maintenance and
specific studies were needed to determine the best cost benefit for the chosen level of service,
the method used for imported materials proved to be significant, as marginal gains were
higher than those of the local supplier. The applied method reduced disruptions, through the
greater availability of materials for resale, based on demand-based studies and controls for
predicting variability, the development of the model with periodic and continuous review
application of the inventory management of an auto parts company proves to be an
advantag

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: APLICAÇÃO DO MAPEAMENTO DO FLUXO DE VALOR NO PROCESSO DE SOLDAGEM E MONTAGEM DE DUTOS TERRESTRES DE PETRÓLEO E DERIVADOS
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: APPLICATION OF VALUE FLOW MAPPING IN WELDING PROCESS AND DUCT ASSEMBLY OIL AND DERIVATIVE TERRESTRIALS

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Extração de Petróleo e Gás Natural
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de coque, de produtos derivados do petróleo e de biocombustíveis

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Resumo:
Para atendimento à demanda de fornecimento de petróleo e seus derivados,
as empresas deste setor no Brasil, especialmente a Petrobras, investem na montagem
de dutos terrestres para transporte destes produtos, e os custos para desenvolver tais
tarefas são altos e envolvem significativa quantidade de recursos de mão de obra e
de equipamentos. Portanto, este trabalho teve como principal objetivo a aplicação da
ferramenta de Mapeamento de Fluxo de Valor (MFV) para mapeamento do estado
atual e do estado futuro dos processos de montagem de dutos terrestres utilizados
para o fornecimento de petróleo e seus derivados, desde a aquisição de tubos até a
conclusão da montagem da tubulação, com posterior análise crítica dos mapeamentos
realizados. Depois da avaliação crítica dos Mapeamentos de Fluxo de Valor no Estado
Futuro, foram propostos planos de ações para a realização das eventuais e possíveis
introduções de melhoria, visando atingir o estado futuro, possibilitando a redução do
custo e do prazo para o desenvolvimento do referido processo.
Palavras Chave: Manufatura Enxuta, Pensamento Enxuto, Sistema Toyota de
Produção, Produção Enxuta, Modal Dutoviário
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
To supply the demand of oil derivatives, companies in this sector in Brazil,
especially Petrobras, invest in the assembly of terrestrial pipelines to transport these
products and the costs to perform such tasks are high and involve large amounts of
workers and equipment resources. Therefore, the main objective of this work was the
application of the Value Stream Mapping (MFV) tool to map the current state and future
state of the pipeline assembly processes used to supply oil and its derivatives, since
the acquisition of pipes until the completion of the pipe assembly, with subsequent
critical analysis of the realized mappings. Following the critical evaluation of Value
Stream Mapping in the Future State, action plans were proposed to carry out possible
and possible improvements in order to reach the future state, making it possible to
reduce the cost and deadline for the development of said process.
Key Words: Lean Manufacturing, Lean Thinking, Toyota Production System, Lean
Production, Pipeline Modal

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de veículos automotores, reboques e carrocerias

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
RESUMO

O estimulo da concorrência obriga a indústria automobilística a crescer e a investir
cada vez mais em novos produtos e na inovação de seus processos de fabricação, visando
sempre aumentar a capacidade produtiva, a fim de obter o maior lucro com o menor
investimento, e melhorando cada vez mais a qualidade do produto; no entanto, para isso é
imprescindível à busca por alternativas que levem a oferecer ao mercado produtos inovadores
e confiáveis com preços competitivos, e lançados em prazos cada vez mais curtos. Isto não só
implica em diminuir o tempo de desenvolvimento e lançamento de novos produtos, mas
também em adequar ou providenciar meios produtivos para atender as novas especificações
de produtos, tendo como foco duas importantes características: tempo de implementação e
precisão no estudo de cenários para os novos sistemas produtivos, esse trabalho apresenta a
função da engenharia de manufatura avançada, a qual é responsável por planejar, desenvolver
e implementar uma nova estrutura ou adequar uma estrutura existente, de forma cada vez mais
precisa e eficaz, minimizando os riscos e erros de projeto; e através da análise de cenários,
estimar o investimento e recurso necessário para o projeto de um novo sistema produtivo de
veículos, auxiliando os executivos da empresa na tomada de decisão. As vantagens obtidas
com o método de dimensionamento e a simulação computacional nas fases de estudo de
cenários e planejamento, são a redução de investimentos, redução do tempo de
desenvolvimento de um novo processo, analise prévia de gargalos e de variação do processo
que impactam na capacidade do sistema produtivo. Neste contexto este trabalho teve um
papel fundamental para a empresa, garantindo agilidade no estudo de cenários e a análise dos
impactos na manufatura.

the computer simulation in the scenario study and planning phases are the investments
reduction, development time reduction of a new process, the early identification of production
bottlenecks and process variation, that impact the capacity of the productive system. In this
context this work had a fundamental role for the company, ensuring scenarios study agility
and the analysis of impacts on manufacturing.
Keywords: Computer Simulation, Productive Process, Vehicle Final Assembly Line,
Automobile Industry, Industrial Produ

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: O TPM e a Manutenção Autônoma dentro de um processo de melhoria contínua: estudo de caso de aumento de OEE em uma Indústria Química
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: The Autonomous Maintenance used to incresead industrial productivity

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
ABRÃO, Odair José. A Manutenção Autônoma utilizada no aumento da produtividade industrial. 2020. Dissertação (Mestrado Profissional em Engenharia Mecânica ? Área de concentração em Produção - Departamento de Engenharia Mecânica ? Universidade de Taubaté, Taubaté, São Paulo - Brasil.
Em períodos de instabilidade econômica aliado à competitividade de mercado, onde cada vez mais se exige que as empresas tenham seu produto a um preço competitivo, entra em cena a manutenção autônoma, visando o aumento da produtividade, atrelado a um baixo custo operacional. O objetivo deste trabalho é demonstrar a importância da metodologia TPM (manutenção produtiva total), bem como, seus pilares, em especial a manutenção autônoma, inserida num processo de melhoria contínua atrelada a outras ferramentas como o SIPOC, Gráfico de Pareto, Diagrama de Causa e Efeito e Programa de Ideias de Melhoria, visando a excelência operacional dos processos. A aplicação de um estudo de caso evidenciará o aumento da produtividade industrial, medida através do indicador de OEE (eficiência global do equipamento), que aliada à alta demanda de mercado, pode proporcionar patamares recordes de faturamento.
Palavras-chave: Melhoria Contínua ? TPM ? Manutenção Autônoma ? OEE ? Indústria Química
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABRÃO, Odair José. The Autonomous Maintenance used to incresead industrial productivity. 2020. Monograph (Professional Master Degree in Mechanical Engineering ? Production´s Area) Department of Mechanical Engineering - University of Taubaté, Taubaté, São Paulo - Brazil.
In periods of economic instability whit market competitiveness, where companies are increasingly required to have their product a competitive price, autonomous maintenance comes into play, aming at increasing productivity, coupled to a low operational cost. The objective of this work is to demonstrate the importante of the TPM methodology (total prodcutive maintenance), as well as its pillars, especially autonomous maintenace, inserted in a process continuous improvement tied to others tools such as SIPOC, Pareto Chart, Cause and Effect Diagram and Improvement Ideas Program, aiming at operational excelence of processes. The aplication of a case study will evidence the increase in industrial productivity, measured through the OEE indicator (overall equipement efectiveness), wich combined with high market demand, can provide record levels of revenue.
Keywords: Continous Improvement ? TPM ? Autonomous Maintenance ? OEE ? Chemical Industry

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO: PROPOSTA DE MÉTODO PARA SOLUÇÃO DE RUPTURA NA GESTÃO OPERACIONAL E APLICAÇÃO NA SISTEMATIZAÇÃO DA GESTÃO DE LISTAS TÉCNICAS
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PARTICIPACAO-EM-BANCA-D.TITULO-INGLES: PROPOSED METHOD FOR BREACH SOLUTION IN OPERATIONAL MANAGEMENT AND APPLICATION IN THE SYSTEMATIZATION OF TECHNICAL LIST MANAGEMENT

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de Produtos Alimentícios

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O consumo tem passado por uma mudança substancial, adequar-se às tendências é uma condição de sobrevivência para operar no dinâmico mercado de bens de consumo. Há uma crescente segmentação dos produtos com os ciclos de vida se reduzindo e as demandas por uma produção sob medida aumentando, com isso ocorre aumento na diversidade de produtos e a redução do volume por SKU. Uma permanente atenção para o redesenho de produtos deve ser uma constante preocupação das empresas. A fim de permanecer competitivos os produtos certos devem ser desenvolvidos e lançados com sucesso em prazos cada vez mais curtos. Esse conjunto de características tornam constantes as necessidades de inclusões e revisões nas listas técnicas no sistema da empresa. Adicionalmente à diversidade dos produtos, a produção em escala exige o controle de um número muito grande de informações sobre os materiais necessários à produção, atendendo essa necessidade o sistema de gestão de materiais MRP II tem sido cada vez mais utilizado para melhoria da eficiência operacional das fábricas, tendo a precisão da lista técnica de materiais como sua espinha dorsal. Desta forma essa dissertação tem como objetivo, por meio da sistematização, obter a garantia da atualização, sistemática e concomitante, das listas técnicas no sistema MRP II e nos controles e parâmetros da produção. A pesquisa-ação considerou, após uma pesquisa bibliográfica, construir um processo formal de gestão de listas técnicas que abrangeu fluxograma, método de cálculo de listas, abrangência de análise de indicadores e governança para gestão dos desperdícios. O método para solução de ruptura na gestão operacional adotado na pesquisa foi o produto da integração dos métodos ciclos da pesquisa-ação com o processo de solução prática de problemas da Toyota. Um grupo de trabalho de especialistas e pesquisador foi constituído para construir, padronizar e implementar o processo de gestão de listas técnicas. O desenvolvimento da pesquisa significou diagnostica
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Consumption has undergone a substantial change, adapting to trends is a condition for survival to operate in the dynamic consumer goods market. There is a growing segmentation of products with reduced life cycles and the demand for tailor-made production increasing, with an increase in product diversity and a reduction in volume per SKU. Permanent attention to product redesign should be a constant concern for companies. In order to remain competitive, the right products must be developed and successfully launched in increasingly short time frames. This set of characteristics makes the needs for inclusions and revisions in the technical lists in the company's system constant. In addition to the diversity of products, scale production requires the control of a very large number of information about the materials needed for production, meeting this need the MRP II material management system has been increasingly used to improve the operational efficiency of factories, having the precision of the technical list of materials as its backbone. Thus, this dissertation aims, through the systematization of management, to obtain the guarantee of updating, systematically and concurrently, the technical lists in the MRP II system and in the controls and parameters of production. The action research considered, after a bibliographic search, to build a formal process of management of technical lists that included flowchart, method of calculating lists, scope of analysis of indicators and governance for waste management. The method for resolving disruptions in operational management adopted in the survey was the product of integrating the methods of the cycles of action research with Toyota's practical problem solving process. A working group of experts and researcher was formed to build, standardize and implement the management process for technical lists. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Systems and subsystems always require maintenance, which is not considered a
cost but an investment in the perpetuation of the business. This paper shows the
importance of aligning Lean Maintenance concepts with the concepts of strategic
maintenance in Brazilian industries or in any type of organization. The method used
was the exploratory research and the case study in a company of transportation
segment. It has been found that the major challenge of a maintenance manager is to
anticipate breakdowns and find the financial break-even point of the company's
maintenance versus production cost. It was also verified the evolution of the concept
of Lean Maintenance for the strategic maintenance demand imposed by the
contemporary companies equipped with computerized world information. The results
showed the need to consolidate a Lean Maintenance system to achieve the
objectives of the main customers and the market. It is concluded that Lean
Maintenance when validated by customers and the market, besides the already
known advantages, results in a suitability of the manufacturing environment to
industry 4.0, perspectives from which every organization today wants to remain.

Keywords: Maintenance. Organization. Systems. Active. Lean Production.
